review.reviewBody: I was suffering from chronic back pain for years. After just a few sessions with Sobia, I feel like a new person. Her approach is so professional and caring. Highly recommended!
The cosmetic hijama has done wonders for my skin! It looks clearer and feels so much healthier. Sobia is truly an expert in her field. The environment is very clean and relaxing.

acceptedAnswer.text: Most people do not find Hijama painful. The sensation is often described as a slight pinch or pressure, similar to a deep tissue massage. We ensure the process is as comfortable as possible for you.

mainEntity.name: How long does a session take?

acceptedAnswer.text: A typical session lasts between 30 to 45 minutes. This includes consultation, preparation, the cupping procedure, and post-treatment care.
Absolutely. We adhere to the strictest hygiene standards. All equipment, including cups and blades, is single-use and sterile. Your safety is our utmost priority.

mainEntity.name: How often should I get Hijama?

acceptedAnswer.text: The frequency depends on your individual health goals. For general wellness, once every 3-4 months is recommended. For specific conditions, we will create a personalized treatment plan during your consultation.

mainEntity.name: What conditions can Hijama help with?

acceptedAnswer.text: Hijama can help with various conditions including chronic pain, migraines, stress, poor circulation, skin issues, hormonal imbalances, and general wellness. It's also practiced for spiritual and religious purposes following Sunnah traditions.

availableService.name: Hijama Cupping Therapy
